    • Uses of Directive in net.jodah.sarge

      Fields in net.jodah.sarge declared as Directive 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      static Directive Directive.Escalate
      Escalates the failure to the supervisor of the supervisor.
      static Directive Directive.Resume
      Resume supervision, re-throwing the failure from the point of invocation if a result is expected.
      static Directive Directive.Rethrow
      Re-throws the failure from the point of invocation.

      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Retries the method invocation.
